etymology.description: 日(日) (rì, "sun") + phonetic 矛(矛) (máo, "spear") = representation of streamers hanging under the sun -> streamers
etymology.interpretation: The character 旒(liú) represents streamers or tassels hanging down, often under a sun-like banner, suggesting a visual resemblance to ceremonial streamers. It combines the semantic component of the sun 日 to suggest visibility or display, with the phonetic aspect provided by 矛, conveying the pronunciation.
